content:
nexus File Photo

UC Santa Barbara mens basketball Head Coach Bob Williams will not have his contract renewed this year ending a  season run at the helm of the program PERIOD

Williams  is the programs winningest head coach after amassing a total of  wins PERIOD He was the longest tenured head coach on the West Coast before the announcement but he has never won an NCAA tournament game PERIOD

Though Williams delivered a total  winning seasons  winning  or more games in five of those seasons  UCSB finished its last season with an abysmal  overall record PERIOD

UCSB missed the Big West Tournament for the first time since  after finishing  in conference play and the program also faced scrutiny after three players received academic probation PERIOD

UCSB has not been to the NCAA tournament since  and only made it to the tournament a total of three times during Williams 19year tenure PERIOD

Director of athletics for UCSB John McCutcheon issued a statement Thursday regarding Williamss termination PERIOD

I informed Coach Williams today that the university will not be extending his contract beyond the current term PERIOD As I am attending the Big West Tournament and related league meetings in Anaheim I was not able to inform Bob in person. he said PERIOD

Public speculation and the potential impact to our mens basketball team members have prompted me to take make this announcement now PERIOD I hope to meet with team members on my return to campus but will have no additional comments at this time he added PERIOD

The university has not yet released the names of any potential candidates to replace Williams PERIOD
